title: The Open Shelter
description: An Advocacy Center & Day Services Shelter for homeless and marginally-housed people in Central Ohio, providing crucial needs directly to those in crisis.

title: Jordan's Crossing Resource Center
description: Provides services including shower and laundry facilities, documentation assistance, clothing program, expanded choice food pantry, and nutritious meals daily.

title: LSS Faith Mission
description: Offers basic food and shelter needs while empowering clients to improve their lives through supportive services.

title: Van Buren Center
description: Operated by the YMCA, this center provides shelter and supportive services for men, women, and families experiencing homelessness.

title: Friends of the Homeless Men's Shelter
description: Provides emergency shelter and supportive services to homeless men, aiming to help them achieve stable housing.

title: Rebecca's Place Women's Shelter
description: Offers emergency shelter and supportive services for homeless women, focusing on helping them transition to stable housing.

title: YWCA Family Center
description: Provides emergency shelter and supportive services for families experiencing homelessness, helping them find stable housing.

title: Holy Family Soup Kitchen
description: Offers free meals and groceries to individuals and families in need, addressing food insecurity in the community.

title: Broad Street Presbyterian Church Food Pantry
description: Provides emergency food assistance to individuals and families facing hunger in the Columbus area.

title: Mid-Ohio Food Collective
description: Aims to end hunger in Central Ohio by providing food and other resources to those in need through a network of partner agencies.

title: Clintonville-Beechwold Community Resources Center
description: Offers a variety of services including a food pantry, senior services, and youth programs to support the community.

title: Gladden Community House
description: Provides programs and services such as a food pantry, youth services, and family support to enhance the well-being of the community.

title: Heart to Heart Food Pantry
description: Offers a choice food pantry to individuals and families in need, promoting dignity and self-sufficiency.

title: NNEMAP Food Pantry
description: Provides food and other resources to residents in need, aiming to alleviate hunger in the community.

title: St. Stephen's Community House
description: Offers programs and services including a food pantry, youth services, and senior support to strengthen the community.
